name: Holey Rally Race
description:
Holey Rally Race is  a force-driven racing game where the tracks are full of holes. Race around the track with the momentum driven controls while trying to avoid the holes in the ground. Race against computer players or if you have a friend nearby, share in some split screen action! 

Features Include:

  • Two Playable Modes
  • AI opponents to play against
  • 8 car models to choose from
  • 2 player split screen

Dev Notes:

  • Had some weird behaviors with the UI when exporting, so the UI may seem oddly sized
